Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.cards

Class WeaponCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.cards.WeaponCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Card, java.io.Serializable
    public class WeaponCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements Card, java.io.Serializable
    The weapon card class to model the weapon card and offer methods to execute its effects.
    See Also:

      • reloadWeapon

        public void reloadWeapon​(java.util.List<PowerUpCard> powerUpCardList)
                  throws IllegalActionException,
                         CostException
        Reloads the weapon and updates the owner's ammo cubes list.
        Parameters:
        powerUpCardList - A list of PowerUpCards that the owner may want to use to reload.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - If the card is already loaded.
        CostException - If the owner doesn't have enough resources to pay the reload cost.

      • activateCard

        public WeaponCard activateCard()
                        throws CardException
        Activates this card by checking the properties.
        Returns:
        This WeaponCard.
        Throws:
        CardException - If some properties that are necessary in order to activate the card are violated.

      • useCard

        public void useCard​(EffectType effectType,
                    EffectArgument target,
                    java.util.List<PowerUpCard> powerUpCardList)
             throws EffectException,
                    PropertiesException,
                    CardException
        Performs the "useCard" action, it executes the effect "effectType" to the targets in "target".
        Parameters:
        effectType - The type of the effect that the player wants to be executed.
        target - The targets on which the player wants to execute the effects.
        powerUpCardList - The list of powerUpCard that the user may want to use in order to pay the cost of the effect (where needed).
        Throws:
        EffectException - If the said effect cannot be used right now.
        PropertiesException - If some properties of the target are not respected.
        CardException - If the card cannot be used right now.

      • toJsonObject

        public javax.json.JsonObject toJsonObject()
        This method creates a JsonObject containing all the information needed in the View. The said JsonObject will add up to every other JsonObject of every other (necessary) class and will be sent to the view when needed.
        Specified by:
        toJsonObject in interface Card
        Returns:
        The JsonObect containig all the information of this card.
